info.name: COVID-19 India Tracker
info.description:
# COVID-19 India Tracker #
* This API gives you the latest COVID-19 State wise and District wise data in India. This API is very simple to use and create awesome Portal.
* We are using the most powerful and lightweight JSON format with simple List of State and Districts.

## How to use? ##
The JSON response contains LIST of Indian State, every State contains LIST of Districts. Isn't simple...?
## [COVID India Tracker](https://covidindiatracker.com/ "COVID India Tracker")
(covidindiatracker.com)
* All State API + Total Data [COVID India Tracker State wise API](https://api.covidindiatracker.com/state_data.json "COVID India Tracker  State wise API")
* Only Total data API [COVID India Tracker Total API](https://api.covidindiatracker.com/total.json "COVID India Tracker Total API")
* Support Portal -- [COVID India Tracker API Support](https://apkproz.com/contact-us "Contact Us")

* Data sourced from COVID19India MOHFW Gov. Org. and Media

## Response Sample ##
`[
    {
        "id": "IN-MH",
        "state": "Maharashtra",
        "active": 6939,
        "confirmed": 8590,
        "recovered": 1282,
        "deaths": 369,
        "cChanges": 0,
        "rChanges": 0,
        "dChanges": 0,
        "districtData": [
            {
                "id": "Mumbai",
                "state": null,
                "name": "Mumbai",
                "confirmed": 5776,
                "recovered": null,
                "deaths": null,
                "oldConfirmed": null,
                "oldRecovered": null,
                "oldDeaths": null
            },
            {
                "id": "Pune",
                "state": null,
                "name": "Pune",
                "confirmed": 1099,
                "recovered": null,
                "deaths": null,
                "oldConfirmed": null,
                "oldRecovered": null,
                "oldDeaths": null
            },
            {
                "id": "Thane",
                "state": null,
                "name": "Thane",
                "confirmed": 752,
                "recovered": null,
                "deaths": null,
                "oldConfirmed": null,
                "oldRecovered": null,
                "oldDeaths": null
            }
          ]
        }
]`

** Note : The null values can be set for any future purpose

* cChanges --> Daily changes in Confirmed Cases
* rChanges --> Daily changes in Recovery Cases
* dChanges --> Daily changes in Death Cases

* oldConfirmed: Previous day old confirmed cases in specific districts,
* oldRecovered: Previous day old recovered cases in specific districts,
* oldDeaths: Previous day old deaths cases in specific districts

### State ID codes useful for Mapping data into GeoMaps. ###

* Build your own COVID19India Tracker using our API

request.description: COVID-19 Daily Updates from India state wise and district wise data.
